target: May I ask a price range that you would like?
context: <user> Can I please book a train to bishops stortford on saturday? <system> Where would you like to depart from? <user> I'd like to leave Cambridge and arrive by 17:30. <system> I have the TR0121 train available. It departs from Cambridge at 15:29 and arrives at Bishops Stortford at 16:07. Would you like to book a ticket? <user> Yes. Please book for 2 people. <system> Your passage has been booked. 16.16 GPB will be payable at the station and your reference number is ZVFTQ0X3 . Will that be all? <user> Thank you. I also need help finding a place to stay. I'd prefer a guesthouse with free wifi <system>
